e O

, O

management O

. O

of O

bank O

of O
each O

to O

. O

, O

and O

) O

. O

Project O
: O
Alert O
messaging O
is O
the O
process O
of O
reliably O
and O
securely O
circulating O
messages O
associated O
with O
an O
event O
to O
interested O
users O

. O
Due O
to O
the O
growth O
of O
Information O
Technology O
( O
IT O
) O
and O
telecommunications O
sectors O
in O
the O
recent O
past O
, O
the O
dissemination O
of O
alert O
messages O
has O
become O
prompt O
and O
easier O

. O
Since O
the O
existing O
business O
environment O
faces O
the O
challenge O
of O
reaching O
increasingly O
segmented O
markets O
, O
the O
design O
, O
delivery O
, O
and O
analysis O
of O
business O
communications O
needs O
to O
be O
tightly O
integrated O
across O
multiple O
alert O
notification O
channels O

. O
Telecommunication O
channels O
through O
which O
subscribers O
can O
receive O
alert O
messages O
may O
include O
email O
, O
fax O
, O
text O
messaging O
, O
instant O
messaging O
, O
broadband O
network O
and O
the O
like O

. O
Due O
to O
myriad O
software O
applications O
implemented O
by O
businesses O
and O
the O
vast O
demographics O
of O
customers O
, O
it O
may O
become O
necessary O
to O
segment O
alert O
messages O
so O
that O
the O
messages O
can O
be O
sent O
through O
channels O
based O
on O
business O
needs O
as O
well O
as O
customer O
preferences O

. O
Further O
, O
in O
order O
to O
maintain O
strong O
customer O
relationships O
, O
businesses O
need O
to O
time O
the O
messages O
precisely O

. O
This O
brief O
illustrates O
how O
Alert O
Notification O
System O
( O
IANS O
) O
can O
help O
organization O
leverage O
existing O
infrastructure O
to O
better O
service O
their O
customers O

. O

: O

certificates O

bonus O
for O

October O

May O
2012 O
Project O
: O
Alert O
messaging O
is O
the O
process O
of O
reliably O
and O
securely O
circulating O
messages O
associated O
with O
an O
event O
to O
interested O
users O
. O
Due O
to O
the O
growth O
of O
Information O
Technology O
( O
IT O
) O
and O
telecommunications O
sectors O
in O
the O
recent O
past O
, O
the O
dissemination O
of O
alert O
messages O
has O
become O
prompt O
and O
easier O
. O
Since O
the O
existing O
business O
environment O
faces O
the O
challenge O
of O
reaching O
increasingly O
segmented O
markets O
, O
the O
design O
, O
delivery O
, O
and O
analysis O
of O
business O
communications O
needs O
to O
be O
tightly O
integrated O
across O
multiple O
alert O
notification O
channels O
. O
Telecommunication O
channels O
through O
which O
subscribers O
can O
receive O
alert O
messages O
may O
include O
email O
, O
fax O
, O
text O
messaging O
, O
instant O
messaging O
, O
broadband O
network O
and O
the O
like O
. O
Due O
to O
myriad O
software O
applications O
implemented O
by O
businesses O
and O
the O
vast O
demographics O
of O
customers O
, O
it O
may O
become O
necessary O
to O
segment O
alert O
messages O
so O
that O
the O
messages O
can O
be O
sent O
through O
channels O
based O
on O
business O
needs O
as O
well O
as O
customer O
preferences O
. O
Further O
, O
in O
order O
to O
maintain O
strong O
customer O
relationships O
, O
businesses O
need O
to O
time O
the O
messages O
precisely O
. O
This O
brief O
illustrates O
how O
Alert O
Notification O
System O
( O
IANS O
) O
can O
help O
organization O
leverage O
existing O
infrastructure O
to O
better O
service O
their O
customers O
. O

: O

• O

a O
performance O
certificates O
and O
given O
a O
bonus O
for O
outstanding O
performance O

for O

environment O
at O

BCWeb O
Wrap O
Migration O
to O
Windows O
Azure -
Client -
: O
Microsoft O
Corporation O
/ O
Group O
: O
VLIT O
Jan O
2011 O
- O
Oct O
2011 O
Case O
Study O
Featured O
on O
TechNet O
Synopsis O
: O
BCWeb O
is O
a O
Windows O
Azure O
ASP.NET O
Web O
Role O
application O
; O
authenticated O
against O
STS O
using O
Federation O
services O
that O
provide O
a O
set O
of O
Web O
forms O
that O
help O
capture O
price O
exception O
details O
, O
information O
on O
business O
case O
for O
doing O
discounts O
on O
price O
lists O
, O
and O
helps O
calculate O
percentage O
of O
discount O

. O
It O
uses O
the O
ASP.NET O
connector O
and O
custom O
Web O
services O
to O
pull O
real O
- O
time O
price O
information O
from O
SAP O
, O
and O
provides O
sales O
executives O
with O
a O
light O
front O
- O
end O
to O
SAP O

. O
BCWeb O
helps O
simulate O
pricing O
discounts O
, O
manage O
business O
rules O
, O
customize O
routing O
and O
approval O
workflows O
, O
and O
update O
the O
LOB O
data O
stored O
in O
SAP O

. O
One O
of O
the O
major O
goals O
of O
this O
system O
is O
to O
improve O
field O
productivity O
by O
simplifying O
the O
process O
and O
removing O
training O
requirements O
for O
complex O
back O
- O
end O
systems O
, O
in O
this O
case O
SAP O

. O
BCWeb O
integrates O
different O
promotion O
types O
into O
a O
simplified O
Web O
- O
application O

. O
It O
also O
allows O
users O
to O
specify O
business O
rules O
using O
Excel O
2007 O
files O
and O
to O
get O
notifications O
in O
Outlook O
2007 O

. O
Additional O
goals O
of O
this O
system O
include O
: O
• O
Reduce O
revenue O
leakage O
by O
having O
a O
business O
case O
documented O
for O
each O
promotion O
field O

. O
• O
Obtain O
visibility O
decisions O
and O
understand O
who O
required O
a O
discount O
and O
why O

. O
• O
Understand O
promotion O
effectiveness O
and O
ensure O
the O
field O
is O
making O
informed O
decisions O

. O
• O
Provide O
a O
configurable O
set O
of O
files O
to O
easily O
change O
empowerment O
guidelines O
by O
having O
a O
single O
master O
data O
of O
workflow O
routing O
and O
approvals O

. O
• O
Specific O
business O
process O
in O
price O
- O
execution O
domain O
, O
however O
, O
pattern O
addresses O
larger O
solutions O
space O

Synopsis O
: O
Origin O
Digital O
, O
a O

application O
service O
provider O
that O

, O

, O

. O

- O

• O

to O
trade O
in O
Multi O
exchange O
, O

segments O
for O
trader O

by O

Ltd. O

management O

Tool O

of O

Module O
- O

Machine O
Language O
MML O
is O
a O
configuration O
tool O
widely O
used O
in O
communication O
equipments O

. O
It O
uses O
Client O
/ O
Server O
architecture O

. O

server O

with O
both O
the O
client O
and O
the O
APP O
in O
the O
equipment O

. O

by O
users O

the O
client O
and O
relays O
it O
to O
APP O
to O

. O

, O

server O
generates O

and O
sends O

. O
It O

. O

"""" O

- O

. O

. O

to O

. O

is O

which O

bridge O
between O
wired O
and O
wireless O
media O

. O

Points O
can O
be O

to O
a O
distribution O
media O
to O

an O
extended O
service O
set O

. O
In O
split O
AP O
architecture O
AP O
's O
connect O
to O
a O
central O
controller O
called O

Controller O
in O
short O

. O

has O

such O

data O

and O

to O

, O

, O

, O
handling O
control O
frames O

. O

, O
Handling O
frames O
, O
conversion O
between O
[ O
… O
] O
802.3 O

AC O

. O

Module O
- O
MML O
INI O
Parser O
Tool O
MML O
is O
Configuration O
Tool O

in O
communication O
equipments O
This O
Configuration O
Tool O
has O

of O

. O

Module O
- O
Man O
Machine O
Language O
MML O
is O
a O
configuration O
tool O
widely O
used O
in O
communication O
equipments O
. O
It O
uses O
Client O
/ O
Server O
architecture O
. O
MML O
server O

with O
both O
the O
client O
and O
the O
APP O
in O
the O
equipment O
. O
It O

by O
users O

client O

relays O
it O
to O
APP O

process O

. O
After O

, O

server O

and O
sends O

back O

client O
. O
It O

other O

modules O
. O
Connection O
Management O
, O

Module O

Module O

TL1 O

Language O
1 O
( O
TL1 O
) O
is O
a O
widely O
used O
, O
"""" O
legacy O
"""" O
, O
management O
protocol O
in O

. O

- O

, O

- O

- O
machine O
language O
, O
and O
is O

to O
manage O
Synchronous O

( O
SONET O
) O
. O
It O

defined O
for O
operation O
system/ O
network O
element O
( O
machine O
- O
to O
- O
machine O
) O

. O
TL1 O
corresponds O
to O
the O
User O
System O
Language O
( O

) O
, O

is O

language O
for O

. O
It O
is O

for O

elements O
in O
a O
network O
. O
TL1 O
Module O
is O
an O
interface O
between O
an O
Application O
and O
Client O
. O
Client O
sends O

TL1 O

to O

Applications O
. O

module O
process O

client O
text O

831 O

back O
to O

Response O
messages O

, O

and O
customer O

. O
I O

. O
Module O
- O
QX O
The O
Qx O
interface O
is O
a O
company O
proprietary O
application O
layer O
protocol O
between O
target O
and O
the O
GUI O
of O
NMS O
. O
By O
this O
protocol O
, O
NE O
can O
communicate O
with O
SCC O
( O
System O
Communication O
and O
Control O
) O
software O
in O
different O
operation O
system O
. O
Each O
command O
has O
defined O
format O
. O

are O

form O
. O

acts O

between O

: O

) O
Description O
of O
the O
project O
Wireless O
LAN O
802.11 O
describes O
MAC O
and O
PHY O
. O
Wireless O
stations O
are O
connected O
to O
form O
a O
basic O
service O
area O
which O
is O
controlled O
by O
a O
base O
station O
called O
Access O
Point O
. O
Access O
Point O
is O
a O
special O
device O
which O
basically O
acts O
as O
a O
bridge O
between O
wired O
and O
wireless O
media O
connected O
to O
a O
distributed O
system O
generally O
Ethernet O
. O
Several O
Access O
Points O
can O
be O
connected O
to O
a O
distribution O
media O
to O
form O
an O
extended O
service O
set O
. O
In O
split O
AP O
architecture O
AP O
's O
connect O
to O
a O
central O
controller O
called O
Access O
Controller O
in O
short O
AC O
. O
AP O
has O
the O
minimal O
functionalities O
such O
as O
receiving O
the O
802.11 O
data O
from O
the O
radio O
and O
forwarding O
data O
and O
management O
frames O
to O
AC O
, O

management O
, O

handling O
control O
frames O
. O

operations O

, O
Handling O
frames O
, O
conversion O
between O
[ O
… O
] O

AC O
. O

DESCRIPTION O
• O
Wide O
Area O
Application O
Services O
( O
WAAS O
) O
is O
a O
Cisco "B-Companies worked at"
Systems "L-Companies worked at"
technology O
that O
improves O
the O
performance O
of O
applications O
on O
a O
wide O
area O
network O
( O
WAN O
) O

. O
WAAS O
combines O
Cisco O
's O
Wide O
Area O
File O
Services O
( O
WAFS O
- O
products O
allow O
remote O
office O
users O
to O
access O
and O
share O
files O
globally O
at O
LAN O
speeds O
over O
the O
WAN O
) O
with O
WAN O
optimization O
inside O
of O
a O
router O
, O
accelerating O
TCP O
- O
based O
applications O
on O
a O
given O
network O

. O
• O
WAAS O
system O
consists O
of O
a O
set O
of O
devices O
called O
wide O
area O
application O
engines O
( O
WAEs O
) O
that O
work O
together O
to O
optimize O
TCP O
traffic O
over O
your O
network O

. O
When O
client O
and O
server O
applications O
attempt O
to O
communicate O
with O
each O
other O
, O
the O
network O
intercepts O
and O
redirects O
this O
traffic O
to O
the O
WAEs O
so O
that O
they O
can O
act O
on O
behalf O
of O
the O
client O
application O
and O
the O
destination O
server O

. O
• O
The O
WAEs O
examine O
the O
traffic O
and O
use O
built O
- O
in O
application O
policies O
to O
determine O
whether O
to O
optimize O
the O
traffic O
or O
allow O
it O
to O
pass O
through O
your O
network O
un O
optimized O
• O
Mainly O
involves O
optimizing O
the O
various O
Ao O
's O
like O
HTTP O
, O
SSL O
, O
HTTPS O
and O
functional O

platform O
check O

. O

LANCER O

SPRIT O
DESCRIPTION O

• O
Wide O
Area O
Application O
Services O
( O
WAAS O
) O
is O
a O
Cisco "B-Companies worked at"
Systems "L-Companies worked at"
technology O
that O
improves O
the O
performance O
of O
applications O
on O
a O
wide O
area O
network O
( O
WAN O
) O
. O
WAAS O
combines O
Cisco O
's O
Wide O
Area O
File O
Services O
( O
WAFS O
- O
products O
allow O
remote O
office O
users O
to O
access O
and O
share O
files O
globally O
at O
LAN O
speeds O
over O
the O
WAN O
) O
with O
WAN O
optimization O
inside O
of O
a O
router O
, O
accelerating O
TCP O
- O
based O
applications O
on O
a O
given O
network O
. O

• O
WAAS O
system O
consists O
of O
a O
set O
of O
devices O
called O
wide O
area O
application O
engines O
( O
WAEs O
) O
that O
work O
together O
to O
optimize O
TCP O
traffic O
over O
your O
network O
. O
When O
client O
and O
server O
applications O
attempt O
to O
communicate O
with O
each O
other O
, O
the O
network O
intercepts O
and O
redirects O
this O
traffic O
to O
the O
WAEs O
so O
that O
they O
can O
act O
on O
behalf O
of O
the O
client O
application O
and O
the O
destination O
server O
. O

• O
The O
WAEs O
examine O
the O
traffic O
and O
use O
built O
- O
in O
application O
policies O
to O
determine O
whether O
to O
optimize O
the O
traffic O
or O
allow O
it O
to O
pass O
through O
your O
network O
un O
optimized O

• O
Mainly O
involves O
optimizing O
the O
various O
Ao O
's O
like O
HTTP O
, O
SSL O
, O
HTTPS O
and O
functional O
wise O
platform O
check O
. O
PRODUCT O

Area O
Application O
Services O
) O

in O
10.6.1 O
, O
VSS O
, O
SQL O
server O
2005 O

. O
Project O
02 O
: O
Concur O
Invoicing O
Concur O
Invoicing O
is O
an O
on O
- O
demand O
, O
Web O
- O
based O
A O
/ O
P O
application O
that O
will O
be O
implemented O
to O
automate O
the O
invoice O
approval O
and O
payment O
process O

. O
The O
application O
captures O
vendor O
/ O
supplier O
invoice O
data O
, O
and O
delivers O
workflow O
and O
approval O
capabilities O
not O
currently O
implemented O
in O
the O
SunSystems O
AP O
module O

. O
The O
intent O
is O
to O
decrease O
potential O
fraud O
and O
mistakes O
, O
while O
increasing O
control O
, O
compliance O
and O
visibility O
into O
invoice O
payment O
The O
proposed O
Concur O
Invoicing O
( O
workflow O
) O
solution O
should O
accomplish O
the O
following O
business O
objectives O
: O
Automate O
the O
current O
procure O
- O
to O
- O
pay O
process O
; O
Deliver O
an O
online O
solution O
capable O
of O
providing O
a O
vehicle O
for O
employees O
to O
enter O
invoices O
, O
route O
them O
for O
approval O
and O
remind O
approvers O
when O
time O
has O
elapsed O
for O
approval O
; O
Provide O
a O
workflow O
whereby O
Axis O
management O
can O
approve O
invoices O
; O
Allow O
for O
the O
automatic O
monitoring O
of O
policies O
; O
Provide O
accounting O
information O
to O
the O
Sun O
GL O
for O
all O
A O
/ O
P O
transactions O
; O
Monitor O
compliance O
to O
corporate O
policy O
and O
budget O
guidelines O
; O
Improve O
A O
/ O
P O
process O
efficiencies O
( O
as O
compared O
to O
the O
current O
manual O
process O
) O
; O
Provide O
the O
creation O
of O
Purchase O
Orders O
for O
the O
Information O
Technology O
department O

. O

. O

: O

. O

Project O
02 O
: O
Concur O
Invoicing O
Concur O
Invoicing O
is O
an O
on O
- O
demand O
, O
Web O
- O
based O
A O
/ O
P O
application O
that O
will O
be O
implemented O
to O
automate O
the O
invoice O
approval O
and O
payment O
process O
. O
The O
application O
captures O
vendor O
/ O
supplier O
invoice O
data O
, O
and O
delivers O
workflow O
and O
approval O
capabilities O
not O
currently O
implemented O
in O
the O
SunSystems O
AP O
module O
. O
The O
intent O
is O
to O
decrease O
potential O
fraud O
and O
mistakes O
, O
while O
increasing O
control O
, O
compliance O
and O
visibility O
into O
invoice O
payment O
The O
proposed O
Concur O
Invoicing O
( O
workflow O
) O
solution O
should O
accomplish O
the O
following O
business O
objectives O
: O
Automate O
the O
current O
procure O
- O
to O
- O
pay O
process O
; O
Deliver O
an O
online O
solution O
capable O
of O
providing O
a O
vehicle O
for O
employees O
to O
enter O
invoices O
, O
route O
them O
for O
approval O
and O
remind O
approvers O
when O
time O
has O
elapsed O
for O
approval O
; O
Provide O
a O
workflow O
whereby O
Axis O
management O
can O
approve O
invoices O
; O
Allow O
for O
the O
automatic O
monitoring O
of O
policies O
; O
Provide O
accounting O
information O
to O
the O
Sun O
GL O
for O
all O
A O
/ O

development O
of O
the O

to O

project O
will O
be O
a O

of O
concept O
where O
.NET O
components O
are O
developed O
to O

and O
enable O

communications O
between O
Microsoft O
BI O
/ O
DW O
applications O
with O
Siebel O
Application O
assist B-Designation
Claim I-Designation
handler L-Designation
Reinsurance "B-Companies worked at"
Claim "I-Companies worked at"
WorkStation "L-Companies worked at"
( O
RCWS O
) O

2001 O
to O
2001 O
RCWS O
application O
is O
intended O
to O
improve O
the O
Claim O
's O
Business O
process O
through O
process O
improvement O
and O
automation O
. O
This O
application O
is O
designed O
to O
assist B-Designation
Claim I-Designation
handler L-Designation
to O
record O
the O
loss O
and O
reduce O
their O
dependency O
on O
the O
existing O
IRIS O
application O
. O
User O
is O
using O
IRIS O
application O
to O
record O
the O
Claims O
which O
does O
not O
support O
claim O
recording O
at O
loss O
level O
this O
cause O
duplication O
of O
General O
loss O
information O
. O
The O
main O
objective O
of O
this O
application O
is O
to O
provide O
a O
rich O
user O
interface O
where O
user O
can O
get O
all O
possible O
information O
and O
the O
fields O
to O
record O
the O
loss O
. O
Various O
summary O
tables O
and O
automated O
calculations O
will O
assist O
user O
to O
record O
the O
claim O
/ O
loss O
in O
more O
efficient O
manner O
. O
On O
technical O
front O

application O
is O
based O

BPM O
- O

architecture O

also O

, O

. O

user O
task O
faster O
and O
easier O
. O

Project O
01 O
: O
Klondike O
( O
Business O

integration O
& O
Datawarehouse O
Solution O
) O
Klondike O
is O
an O
endeavor O
of O
Microsoft O
Business O
Intelligence O
group O
to O
provide O
data O
warehousing O
solution O
that O
is O
integrated O
with O
Biz O
# O
, O
Share O
point O
portal O
and O
Microsoft O
Excel O
to O
supply O
decision O
making O
system O
with O
slice O
and O
dice O
reports O
. O
This O
solution O
enables O
decision O
makers O
to O
have O
a O
complete O
view O
of O
their O
business O
in O
their O
own O
terms O
. O
This O
project O
provides O
solution O
to O
problems O
like O
Business O
data O
being O
spread O
across O
different O
systems O
, O
different O
systems O
having O
proprietary O
access O
methods O
, O
different O
semantics O
etc O
, O
reference O
data O
being O
inconsistent O
across O
different O
systems O
, O
transactional O
systems O
being O
highly O
granular O
/ O
detail O
oriented O
, O
often O
highly O
customized O
, O
changing O
over O
time O
, O
lagging O
behind O
changing O
view O
of O
business O
. O
